name: Toxic Barrage
description: Unleash a barrage of arrows at an enemy, dealing 17420 Poison Damage over 4 seconds.   After dealing damage you poison the enemy, dealing an additional 8995 Poison Damage over 8 seconds after a 1 second delay.    You can move at full speed and are immune to all disabling effects while channeling this attack.
effectLines: Deals Poison Damage. Dealing damage with the attack injects them with poison, dealing additional damage over time.
coefDescription: Unleash a barrage of arrows at an enemy, dealing $1 Poison Damage over 4 seconds.   After dealing damage you poison the enemy, dealing an additional $2 Poison Damage over 8 seconds after a 1 second delay.    You can move at full speed and are immune to all disabling effects while channeling this attack.
